definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Microorganism in the air gone into the lake affected water quality of it.
sentences.chinese: 空气中的微生物进入水体影响衡水湖的水质。

sentences.english: Farm irrigation from these free-flowing bodies is the biggest single human use of freshwater.
sentences.chinese: 自由流通水体的农场灌溉是人们最大的淡水单一使用。

sentences.english: This book is about water , air and soil pollution.
sentences.chinese: 这是一本介绍水体，大气和土壤污染的书籍。

sentences.english: Thus, ice floats on water and a body of water freezes from the top down.
sentences.chinese: 因此，冰浮在水上，水体从上向下冻结。

sentences.english: Meadow planting. New island beds directly adjacent to the water, were designed into the new patio.
sentences.chinese: 直接与水体毗邻的草坪种植岛被设计成新的露台。

sentences.english: The salinity in seawater will increase when the sea ice are exploited and desalinated extensively.
sentences.chinese: 海冰的大规模开采和淡化会导致周围水体的盐分增加。

sentences.english: One of the most important factors contributing to the deterioration in water quality is agricultural non-point source pollution.
sentences.chinese: 农业面源污染是水体污染中主要的问题之一。

sentences.english: One indicator is the levels of calcium and aragonite.
sentences.chinese: 其中一个就是水体中的钙和霰石的水平。

sentences.english: The degradation of Fuchsin acid in aqueous solution by contact glow discharge electrolysis is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了接触辉光放电等离子体降解水体中的酸性品红。

sentences.english: This method improves the accuracy of small water-body picking-up.
sentences.chinese: 该方法有效的提高了细小水体提取的精度。

sentences.english: The dragons of Japan are water deities, frequently associated with rainfall and bodies of water.
sentences.chinese: 日本的龙是水神，经常让人联想到降雨和水体。

sentences.english: The chemical oxygen demand is referred as important indicator of organic substance in water.
sentences.chinese: 化学需氧量是水体中有机物含量的重要指标。

sentences.english: The purification ability of Elodea Canadensis Michx is higher than those of Potamogeton Crispus Linn and Ceratophyllum Demersum Linn.
sentences.chinese: 伊乐藻对水体的净化能力高于菹草和金鱼藻。

sentences.english: The reason of pollution was analyzed and the countermeasures wasp uts forward.
sentences.chinese: 以广通河为例提出水体污染形成的原因及防治对策。

sentences.english: There existed a definite amount of SRB in the deep aquatic environment.
sentences.chinese: 阿哈湖深层水体中有一定数量的硫酸盐还原菌存在。

sentences.english: The water-body eutrophication is the typical water-body pollution.
sentences.chinese: 水体的富营养化是典型的水体污染。

definition: water plants/habitat with water source and grass
